### Scatter Plot
Great for comparing **two features** per item (e.g., frequency vs length).

```{python}
def scatter_len_vs_freq(tokens, title="Length vs Frequency"):
    c = Counter(tokens)
    df = pd.DataFrame([{"token": k, "freq": v, "length": len(k)} for k,v in c.items()])
    plt.figure()
    plt.scatter(df["length"], df["freq"])
    plt.xlabel("Token length")
    plt.ylabel("Frequency")
    plt.title(title)
    plt.tight_layout()
    plt.show()

scatter_len_vs_freq(lem_en, "English: Length vs Frequency")
```

### Word Cloud (Fun Finale)
Useful as a **qualitative** summary of frequent items.

```{python}
from wordcloud import WordCloud

def wordcloud_from_tokens(tokens, title="Word Cloud"):
    c = Counter(tokens)
    wc = WordCloud(width=800, height=400, background_color="white")
    wc = wc.generate_from_frequencies(c)
    plt.figure()
    plt.imshow(wc, interpolation="bilinear")
    plt.axis("off")
    plt.title(title)
    plt.show()

wordcloud_from_tokens(lem_es, "Spanish Word Cloud")
```

## Choosing the Right Chart

- **Bar (horizontal)**: rankable categories; easy comparison
- **Pie**: proportion snapshots (few categories)
- **Line**: order matters (rank, time)
- **Scatter**: relationship between two numeric features
- **Word cloud**: quick qualitative gist
